amaragiri：amaragiri（pu）
အမရဂိရိ（ပု）
[amara+giri]
[အမရ+ဂိရိ]

Amaragiri：1. Amaragiri.-One of the three palaces occupied by Atthadassī Buddha during his lay life.

Bu.xv.15.

2. Amaragiri，-A monastery in Ceylon，in which lived the Elder Vanaratana. In the time of Bhuvanekabāhu IV. it seems to have been the home of the orthodox monks. P.L.C.240.
